attributes.action: Calling on the Government to abolish all fines for breaches of covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Refund all fines that were given out during covid 19.
attributes.background: Calling on the Government to abolish all fines handed out for breaching covid 19 restrictions, considering how many breaches have taken place by their own members and staff who have not received  fines. It needs to be fair and transparent for all , not  one rule for them and one for the people.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you might like to sign:

Refund anyone who was fined last year for having a gathering during Covid
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603344
